definition: to win (a prize in a lottery)
to draw out/to pull out from in between/to remove part of the whole/(of certain plants) to sprout or bud/to whip or thrash
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
within/among/in/middle/center/while (doing sth)/during/(dialect) OK/all right
China/Chinese/surname Zhong

sentences.english: She was chosen by lot to represent us.
sentences.chinese: 她抽中签当我们的代表。

sentences.english: This lucky draw came first in the 2nd Category of the Sweepstake .
sentences.chinese: 这次幸运抽中的是二类马票的第一次抽奖。

sentences.english: When the draw is made for home and away games, we get away ones on Wednesdays.
sentences.chinese: 当抽签决定主客场时，我们在周三都被抽中客场比赛。

sentences.english: Laura was chosen by lot to represent us.
sentences.chinese: 劳拉抽中签当我们的代表。

sentences.english: For Team Draft, players do not share the drafted cards.
sentences.chinese: 组队轮抽中，同队牌手不共享这些抽到的牌。

winner/lucky guy/person who always gets good breaks
to win a prize/a successful gamble

award/prize

to draw the winning ticket (in a lottery)
